duties_responsibilities.duty: Independently evaluate a variety of geographically dispersed services provided to individuals with mental illness and developmental disabilities by State operated facilities and programs.
Conduct studies to evaluate program needs, processes, outcomes, impacts, costs/benefits, effectiveness, and individuals’ satisfaction.
Collect, review, and analyze quantitative data related to programmatic services and produce management reports.
Assist in oversight and management of a program evaluation department and supervise related staff.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree plus three years of program evaluation experience (Master's preferred)
